interface.name: zcr_touchpad_haptics_v1

description.summary: Allows to play haptic feedback effects on touchpad

interface.description:
Allows to play haptic feedback effects on touchpad.
Warning! The protocol described in this file is experimental and backward incompatible changes may be made. Backward compatible changes may be added together with the corresponding uinterface version bump. Backward incompatible changes are done by bumping the version number in the protocol and uinterface names and resetting the interface version. Once the protocol is to be declared stable, the 'z' prefix and the version number in the protocol and interface names are removed and the interface version number is reset.

description.summary: release the memory for the touchpad haptics object

event.name: activated
event.description: Inform the client that a haptic touchpad is present and ready to perform effects.

event.name: deactivated
event.description: Inform the client that no haptic touchpad is available, likely because the user disabled haptic effects.

entry.name: snap
entry.summary: UI feedback for snapping into place

entry.name: snap_reverse
entry.summary: UI feedback for snapping out of place

entry.name: knock
entry.summary: UI feedback for reaching a limit or boundary

entry.name: tick
entry.summary: UI feedback for discrete state changes

entry.name: toggle_on
entry.summary: UI feedback for activating a feature

entry.name: toggle_off
entry.summary: UI feedback for deactivating a feature

entry.name: deep_press
entry.summary: Deeper (more force) touchpad button down effect

entry.name: deep_release
entry.summary: Deeper (more force) touchpad button up effect

request.name: play
request.description: Play the given haptic feedback with the given strength. The strength should be in [1, 5].
